subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Paul Pierce, the M.V.P of last season’s finals, scored 27 points as the Boston Celtics followed an emotional ring ceremony and banner raising with a victory over the Cleveland Cavaliers.
snippet: Paul Pierce, the M.V.P of last season’s finals, scored 27 points as the Boston Celtics followed an emotional ring ceremony and banner raising with a victory over the Cleveland Cavaliers.
